title: What Are the NFLâ€™s Least Watchable Teams?
description:
After drafting the most watchable teams in the NFL last week, Danny Heifetz, Ben Solak, and Steven Ruiz return to draft and discuss the least watchable teams this season.
Hosts: Danny Heifetz, Benjamin Solak, and Steven Ruiz
Associate Producer: Mike Wargon
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal and Conor Nevins
